name: W:P Fancy Ball
desc:
2+ Effect Monsters		
When your opponent activates a monster effect on the field or GY (Quick Effect): You can banish this card that was Special Summoned this turn until the End Phase; negate that effect, and if you do, banish it. During your opponent's Main Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 Link Monster, and if this card you control would be used as material for that Link Summon, you can also use 1 Link-2 or lower monster your opponent controls. Neither player can activate the effects of Link Monsters in response to this effect's activation. You can only use each effect of "W:P Fancy Ball" once per turn.

name: Shipping Archfiend
desc: You can target any number of face-up monsters on the field, and declare 1 Type or Attribute; they become that Type or Attribute. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field, while this card is in your Monster Zone (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 monster on each field with the same Type and Attribute from each other; return them to the hand. You can only use each effect of "Shipping Archfiend" once per turn.

name: Vodnika the Fountain Spirit
desc: If a Level 10 monster(s) is sent to the GY, except "Vodnika the Fountain Spirit" (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your GY (if it was there when the monster was sent) or hand (even if not) in Defense Position, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can target 1 Level 10 monster in your GY; Special Summon it to your opponent's field (but negate its effects), then draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Vodnika the Fountain Spirit" once per turn.

name: Jade Dragon Mech
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuners	
If this card is Special Summoned: You can send 1 Machine Tuner from your Deck to the GY, or if you control a monster whose current Level is different from its original Level, you can Special Summon it instead. You can only use this effect of "Jade Dragon Mech" once per turn. If this Synchro Summoned card is destroyed by card effect and sent to the GY: You can banish any number of Tuners from your GY, then target that many cards on the field; destroy them.

name: Mechanical Mechanic
desc: When an attack is declares involving your other Machine monster: You can increase or decrease the Level of that other monster by 1. You can only use each of the following effects of "Mechanical Mechanic" once per turn. If a card is in the Field Zone: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can target face-up 1 Spell/Trap Card you control; destroy it, and if you do, add 1 WIND Machine monster with 0 ATK from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot Special Summon from the extra Deck for the rest of that turn, except Machine monsters.

name: Rain of Frogs
desc: If you control an Aqua monster with 2000 or more ATK: Send all monsters on the field to the GY, except Aqua monsters. If this Set card is destroyed by card effect: You can Set this card. You can only use each effect of "Rain of Frogs" once per turn.

name: Mercurium the Living Quicksilver
desc:
2+ Level 10 monsters
	
If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can attach 1 monster from your Deck to this card as material. You can only use this effect of "Mercurium the Living Quicksilver" once per turn. While this card has material, your opponent cannot activate the effects of monsters in their GY with the same Attribute as a monster in your GY. Once per turn, during the End Phase: Detach 1 material from this card or take 3000 damage.

name: Returned Dino Daneen
desc: If this card is Special Summoned by a monster effect: You can add 1 "GMX" monster from your Deck to your hand. During your Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 Dinosaur Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field. If this card is sent to the GY: You can make all Dinosaur monsters you currently control gain 400 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Returned Dino Daneen" once per turn.

name: GMX Applied Experiment #55
desc: Excavate the top cards of your Deck until you have excavated a "GMX" monster and a Dinosaur monster, lose 400 LP for each excavated card, then you can Fusion Summon 1 "GMX" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using any excavated monsters as material, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. You can only activate 1 "GMX Applied Experiment #55" per turn.

name: Mischief of the Wolves
desc:
Apply these effects in sequence:
● Reduce the Levels of all monsters your opponent controls by 2.
● Increase the Levels of all monsters you control by 2.
During your Main Phase, if this card is in your GY because it was sent there this turn: You can target 1 face-up card you control; destroy it, and if you do, add this card to your hand. 
You can only use this effect of "Mischief of the Wolves" once per turn.

name: Flux Oschenfeld
desc:
1 Level 5 or higher EARTH monster + 1 Rock monster
If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Rock monster from your hand or GY, except "Flux Oschenfeld". 
(Quick Effect): You can target 1 EARTH monster you control and 1 card your opponent controls; return them to the hand. 
You can only use each effect of "Flux Oschenfeld" once per turn, and cannot activate more than 1 in the same chain.

name: Storm-Bane Dragon Destorbim
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non Tuners
Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects. 
You can only use each of the following effects of "Storm-Bane Dragon Destorbim" once per turn. 
You can banish any number of DARK monsters from your GY that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set; banish that many cards your opponent controls. This is a Quick Effect if your opponent controls more cards than you do. 
If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 of your banished Dragon monsters.

name: GMX Researcher Selande
desc:
If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 non-Warrior "GMX" monster or 1 Level 3 or lower Dinosaur monster from your Deck. 
If this card is Special Summoned by a monster effect: You can add 1 "GMX" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. 
If a Dinosaur Fusion Monster is on the field: You can shuffle this card from the field into the Deck, and if you do, negate the effects of 1 face-up card on the field until the end of this turn. 
You can only use each effect of "GMX Researcher Selande" once per turn.

name: GMX Chairman Kimridge
desc:
You can reveal this card in your hand; add 1 "GMX Applied Experiment #55" from your Deck or GY to your hand, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. 
If this card is Special Summoned by a monster effect: You can target 2 cards in your GY, that are "GMX" cards and/or Dinosaur monsters; place them on top of your Deck in any order, then you can destroy 1 Attack Position monster your opponent controls. 
You can only use each effect of "GMX Chairman Kimridge" once per turn.

name: GMX Associate Noma
desc:
If this card is Special Summoned by a monster effect: You can target 1 card each from your GY and your opponent's GY; place each card on either the top or bottom of the Deck. 
If a monster is Normal or Special Summoned to your opponent's field, while this card is in your Monster Zone (except during the Damage Step): You can Fusion Summon 1 "GMX" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling monsters from your field, GY, and/or banishment into the Deck. 
You can only use each effect of "GMX Associate Noma" once per turn.

name: GMX - ALLOS
desc:
1 "GMX" monster + 1 Dinosaur monster	
Each time your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s), gain 200 LP. 
You can only use each of the following effects of "GMX – ALLOS" once per turn. 
You can target 1 "GMX" monster or 1 Dinosaur monster in your GY or banishment; Special Summon it. This card cannot attack the turn this effect is activated. 
At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can destroy that monster.

name: GMX - VELOX
desc:
1 "GMX" monster + 1 Dinosaur monster	
Each time your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s), gain 200 LP. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card your opponent controls; excavate the top cards of your Deck until you excavate a "GMX" monster or a Dinosaur monster, lose 400 LP for each excavated card, add that "GMX" monster or Dinosaur monster to your hand or Special Summon it, and shuffle the rest into the Deck. Also, after that, destroy the targeted card. You can only use this effect of "GMX – VELOX" once per turn.

name: Kewl Tune Crackle
desc:
"Kewl Tune Clip" + 1+ Tuners
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can look at your opponent's Extra Deck and banish 1 card from it (until the End Phase), then you can make this card gains ATK equal to the banished monster's.
②：If this Synchro Summoned card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon it, then you can look at your opponent's Extra Deck and banish 2 cards from it until the End Phase.

name: Kewl Tune Back 2 Back
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ Synchro monsters
You can only use the ③ effect of this card's name twice per turn.
①：The Levels of monsters your opponent controls are increased by 2.
②：Your Tuners can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.
③：When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Tuner in your GY or banishment, except a Level 10 monster; either add it to your hand or Special Summon it, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Synchro Summon 1 monster.

name: Kewl Tune Rotary
desc:
If this card on the field would be used as Synchro Material, 1 Tuner in your hand can be used as 1 of the other materials. You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can reveal this card and 1 other Tuner in your hand; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 Tuner.
②：If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can activate 1 of these effects;
● Place 1 card from your opponent's GY on the bottom of the Deck.
● Look at your opponent's hand, then you can add 1 "Kewl Tune" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.

name: Dominus Spark
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn. During the turn your opponent activated a monster effect in the hand or GY, you can activate this card from your hand.
①：Target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish it, then, if you have no Traps in your GY, they can Special Summon 1 monster from their hand. If you activated this card from your hand, you cannot activate the effects of EARTH, WATER, FIRE, and WIND monsters for the rest of this Duel.

name: Solemn Report
desc:
You can activate this card the turn it was Set by revealing 1 of your other Set Traps.
①：When a Spell/Trap Card is activated: Activate 1 of these effects;
● Pay 1500 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card, and if you do that, for the rest this turn, neither player can activate that card's effects, as well as cards with the same original name and their effects.
● Pay 3000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card, then your opponent banishes all cards with its same original name from their hand and Deck.

name: WAKE CUP! Kuro
desc:
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can reveal this card in your hand; add 1 WIND Flip monster from your Deck to your hand, except "WAKE CUP! Kuro", then discard 1 card.
②：FLIP: You can target 1 other face-up monster on the field; change it to face-down Defense Position.
③：(Quick Effect): You can target 1 Set monster; change it to face-up Defense Position.

name: Deep-Eyes White Dragon, the Blue Abyss
desc:
This card is always treated as a "Blue-Eyes" card. You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can discard this card; add 1 Level 1 LIGHT Tuner from your Deck to your hand.
②：If a "Blue-Eyes" Ritual Monster(s) and/or "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" is sent to your GY: You can target 1 of them; Special Summon this card from your GY (if it was there when the monster was sent) or hand (even if not), and if you do, its ATK becomes that monster's, but banish it when it leaves the field.

name: Future Fusion Nova
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：When this card resolves, Fusion Summon 1 LIGHT Machine Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your Deck, including "Cyber Dragon", also, for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon, except Machine monsters, also you cannot attack, except with the Summoned monster. If this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. If that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

name: Red Dragon Archfiend’s Chain
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn. You can activate this card the turn it was Set by revealing 1 "Red Dragon Archfiend" in your Extra Deck.
①：Activate this card by revealing any number of monsters from your hand, then target Effect Monsters your opponent controls equal to the number of Tuners revealed +1; they lose 100 ATK for each card revealed, also their effects are negated. If the last of those monsters is not on the field, destroy this card.

name: Galaxy Defense Robot Orbital 7
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can Tribute this card from your hand or field; take 1 "Photon" monster and 1 "Galaxy" monster from your Deck, add 1 of them to your hand, send the other to the GY, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except LIGHT monsters.
②：If a "Galaxy-Eyes" monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field.

name: Clear Wing Synchro Dragon of the Four Heavenly Dragons
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters	
This card is always treated as a "Speedroid" card. You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Special Summoned: You can destroy 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls, and if you do, this card gains ATK equal to that monster's original ATK.
②：When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower WIND Tuner from your hand or GY (but its effects are negated), then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Synchro Summon 1 WIND monster.

name: Rokket Barrage
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can send 1 DARK Dragon monster from your Deck to the GY, except a Level 5 monster; Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except DARK monsters.
②：When a Link Monster's effect is activated that targets this card on the field (Quick Effect): You can destroy this card, then Special Summon up to 1 "Rokket" monster each from your hand, Deck, GY, and/or banishment, except "Rokket Barrage".

name: Multiplying Kuriboh!
desc:
You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：When an opponent's monster declares an attack, or your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：Once per turn, if an opponent's monster attacks, during damage calculation, OR, when your opponent activates a monster effect on the field (Quick Effect): You can add to your hand, or Special Summon, 1 "Dark Magician" or 1 monster with 300 ATK/200 DEF from your Deck or GY, then you can change that opponent's monster's ATK to 0.

name: Winged Kuriboh Sabatiel LV10
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can reveal this card in your hand and pay half your LP; add 1 "Polymerization" Spell or "Fusion" Spell from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "HERO" monsters.
②：During your opponent's turn, if you have 1000 LP or less (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can inflict damage to your opponent equal to the highest ATK among the monsters they control.

name: Starjunk Synchron
desc:
For a Synchro Summon, you can substitute this card for any 1 "Synchron" Tuner. You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is in your hand: You can target 1 Level 2 or lower monster in your GY; Special Summon this card, and if you do, Special Summon that monster, but its effects are negated, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Synchro Monsters.
②：You can banish this card from your GY; "Junk Warrior" you control cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects this turn.

name: Gagaga Magician – Gagaga Magic
desc:
You can only use the effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is in your hand: You can Special Summon it and 1 other "Zubaba", "Gagaga", "Gogogo", or "Dododo" monster from your hand or GY, except "Gagaga Magician – Gagaga Magic", and if you do, immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 "Zubaba", "Gagaga", "Gogogo", "Dododo", "Djinn", "Heroic Champion", "Number", "ZW -", or "ZS -" monster using only those 2 monsters. When you do, treat the Level of 1 of the monsters the same as the other monster's.

name: Horoscope Sorcerer, the Stargazer Magician
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 1
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use the Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：When an opponent's activated Spell Card or effect resolves, if you control a "Magician" Pendulum Monster or "Odd-Eyes" monster, you can negate that effect, then destroy this card.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ monster effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can discard 1 other "Magician" Pendulum Monster, "Performapal" monster, or "Odd-Eyes" monster; Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 Pendulum Monster with 2500 ATK from your Deck to your hand.
③：You can target 1 Pendulum Monster Card you control; destroy it, then you can add 1 face-up Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand.

name: Cyberse Code Magician
desc:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Cynet Ritual"
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If a Link Monster you control would be used as Link Material for a Cyberse monster, this card in your hand can also be used as material.
②：If this card is sent from the hand or field to the GY: You can activate this effect; you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Cyberse monsters, also send 1 Cyberse monster from your Deck to the GY, or, if this card was Ritual Summoned, you can Special Summon that monster instead.

name: H-E-R-O Flash!
desc:
You can only activate a card with this card's name per turn.
①：Activate 1 of these effects.
● For the rest of this turn, if an "Elemental HERO" monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.
● Target cards your opponent controls, up to the number of "Elemental HERO" monsters you control; destroy them.
● Take 1 "Elemental HERO" monster from your GY, and if you do, either add it to your hand or Special Summon it.
● For the rest of this turn, "Elemental HERO" monsters you control can attack your opponent directly.

name: Moving Point Pendulum
desc:
①：Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: Place 1 T Counter on this card.
②：Once per turn: You can target 1 Pendulum Monster in your Main Monster Zone; move that Pendulum Monster to an adjacent Main Monster Zone a number of times equal to the number of T Counters on this card, then, if there is any opponent's Fusion and/or Xyz Monster(s) with a Level/Rank equal to or lower than the targeted monster's Pendulum Scale in its column, destroy as many of them as possible, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the total ATK they had on the field.

name: Trito Enneacraft – “exapatisIA”
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 0
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use the ② Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：Each time a monster(s) is flipped face-up, place 1 E.C. Counter on this card.
②：You can pay 900 LP; reveal 3 "Enneacraft" cards from your Deck, your opponent randomly picks 1 for you to add to your hand, shuffle the rest into the Deck.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
①：You can reveal this card in your hand; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand in face-down Defense Position. You cannot Special Summon the turn you activate this effect, except in face-down Defense Position.
②：When your opponent activates a card or effect that includes an effect that Sets a card(s): You can change this face-down card to face-up Defense Position; add 1 "Enneacraft" card from your Deck to your hand.
③：FLIP: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls, and if you do, Special Summmon 1 monster from your hand in face-down Defense Position.

name: Enneacraft – Atil.SPIA
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 0
[ Pendulum Effect ]
①：Each time a monster(s) is flipped face-up, place 1 E.C. Counter on this card.
②：At the end of the Battle Phase, if you have an "Enneacraft" card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls with less ATK than this card; destroy it.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
①：You can reveal this card in your hand; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand in face-down Defense Position. You cannot Special Summon the turn you activate this effect, except in face-down Defense Position.
②：When your opponent activates a card or effect as Chain Link 3 or higher (Quick Effect): You can change this face-down card to face-up Defense Position; negate the activations of your opponent's cards and effects activated before this effect in this Chain, and if you do, destroy the negated cards.
③：After this card was flipped face-up, while it is in the Monster Zone, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of their own cards and effects.

name: Enneacraft Reset
desc:
You can only activate a card with this card's name once per turn.
①：Place 1 "Enneapolis" from your Deck or GY face-up in your Field Zone, or, if you already control "Enneapolis", you can negate the effects of face-up cards your opponent controls up to the number of cards in your Pendulum Zone instead.
②：If your opponent activates a card or effect while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card; change "Enneacraft" monsters you control to face-down Defense Position up to the number of cards in your Pendulum Zone.

name: Clown Crew Biancaviso
desc:
You can Tribute Summon this card face-up by Tributing 1 Ritual, Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, Pendulum or Link Monster.
①：If this card is Tribute Summoned: You can activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each effect of this card's name once per turn);
● Draw cards equal to the number of monsters Tributed for its Tribute Summon.
● Negate the effects of face-up cards your opponent controls, equal to the number of monsters Tributed for its Tribute Summon.
②：Once per turn, during your opponent's Main Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Tribute Summon 1 monster.

name: Clown Crew Flare
desc:
You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Clown Crew" card
You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can reveal this card in your hand; add 1 "Clown Crew" card from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 card.
②：If this card is Tributed: You can activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each of these effects of this card's name once per turn);
● Shuffle all Ritual Monsters on the field and in the GYs into the Deck.
● Change 1 Effect Monster on the field to face-down Defense Position.

name: Clown Crew Diablo
desc:
2 monsters with the same Attribute but different Types	
①：If your Tribute Summoned monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict double piercing battle damage.
②：If this card is Tributed: You can activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each of these effects of this card's name once per turn);
● Return all Fusion Monsters on the field and in the GYs into the Extra Deck.
● Set 1 "Clown Crew" Trap from your Deck.

name: Clown Crew Meteor
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
①：Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects when your monster is Tribute Summoned.
②：If this card is Tributed: You can activate 1 of these effects (but you can only choose each of these effects of this card's name once per turn);
● Return all Synchro Monsters on the field and in the GYs to the Extra Deck.
● Target 1 "Clown Crew" card in your GY, except "Clown Crew Meteor"; add it to your hand.

name: Clown Crew Devils
desc:
2 Level 3 monsters
①：Your Tribute Summoned monsters gain 1000 ATK.
②：If this card is Tributed: You can activate 1 of these effects (but you can only choose each of these effects of this card's name once per turn);
● Return all Xyz Monsters on the field and in the GYs to the Extra Deck.
● Set 1 "Clown Crew" Spell from your Deck.

name: Clown Crew “Rehearsal”
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Tribute 1 monster from your hand or field; add 1 "Clown Crew Whiteface" and 1 "Clown Crew" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Clown Crew "Rehersal"".
②：You can banish this card from your GY; Ritual Summon 1 "Clown Crew" Ritual Monster from your hand, by Tributing monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal or exceed that monster's.

name: Clown Crew “Matinee”
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Clown Crew" monster from your Deck or Extra Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions, also you cannot activate the effects of monsters Special Summoned from the Deck and Extra Deck until the end of the next turn.
②：During the End Phase: You can draw 1 card for each type of monster (Ritual, Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, Pendulum, Link) Tributed this turn, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand.

name: Clown Crew “Malabarism”
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Special Summon 2 "Clown Crew" monsters from your Deck and/or Extra Deck, ignoring their Summoning conditions, also you cannot activate the effects of monsters Special Summoned from the Deck and Extra Deck until the end of the next turn after this card resolves.
②：During your Main Phase, if this card in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish it and Tribute 1 monster from your hand or field, then target 1 card on the field; return it to the hand.

name: Clown Crew "Soiree"
desc:
①：Activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each of these effects of this card's name once per turn); you cannot activate the effects of monsters Special Summoned from the Deck and Extra Deck until the end of the next turn after this card resolves.
● Special Summon 2 "Clown Crew" monsters from your Deck and/or Extra Deck, ignoring their Summoning conditions.
● Add 1 "Clown Crew" monster from your Deck to your hand.
②：During the Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; immediately after this effect resolves, Tribute Summon 1 "Clown Crew" monster face-up.

name: Clown Crew "New Face"
desc:
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：During the Standby Phase: You can shuffle 3 "Clown Crew" cards from your GY and/or banishment into the Deck, then draw 1 card.
②：If you Tribute Summon a monster: You can target other Spells/Traps on the field up to the number of monsters Tributed for it; destroy them.
③：If this card is sent to the GY, except from the field: You can place it face-up on your field.

name: DoomZ XIII Over – Graflario
desc:
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "DoomZ XIII Over – Graflario" by using 1 "DoomZ" Xyz Monster you control (transfer its materials). You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can detach 1 material from this card; add 1 "DoomZ" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, then you can destroy 1 card on the field.
②：If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can Special Summon 1 non-Xyz "DoomZ" monster from your Deck or GY.

name: DoomZ Command "A.D.R.A.S.T.E.I.A."
desc:
You can only use the ② and ③ effects of this card's name once per turn.
①：The first time the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed.
②：During your Main Phase: You can destroy the equipped monster, and if you do, Special Summon 1 other "DoomZ" monster from your hand, GY, or banishment in Defense Position.
③：If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to it, then take damage equal to its Level/Rank x 100.

name: Videlium the Power Patron of Chaos Extermination
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 11
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use the Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can activate 1 of these effects;
● Destroy this card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Power Patron" monster from your hand or GY.
● Destroy this card, also, this turn, "Power Patron" monsters you control whose original Level is 12 will gain 5000 ATK.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your face-up Extra Deck or GY) by returning 1 Fusion, 1 Synchro, and 1 Xyz Monster from your face-up field and/or GY to the Extra Deck. You can only use the ① monster effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is added to your Extra Deck face-up: You can add 1 "Power Patron" card from your Deck to your hand.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: Banish all cards from the GYs face-down.
③：Unaffected by non-"Power Patron" monsters' effects.

name: Power Patron Shadow Beast Nervedo
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 1
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use the Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：When a monster effect activated by your opponent in response to the activation of your "Power Patron" or "Artmage" monster's effect resolves, you can negate that effect, then destroy this card.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
This card is always treated as an "Artmage" card. You can only use the ① and ② monster effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can banish the top 3 cards of your Deck face-down; destroy this card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Nerva the Power Patron of Creation" from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Fusion Summon).
②：If this card is added to your Extra Deck face-up: You can Special Summon 1 "Power Patron" or "Artmage" monster from your Deck or face-up Extra Deck, except "Power Patron Shadow Beast Nervedo".

name: Power Patron Shadow Machine Zegredo
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 1
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use the Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase: You can destroy this card and 1 "Power Patron" or "DoomZ" monster in your hand or face-up field, then you can destroy 1 card on the field.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
This card is always treated as a "DoomZ" card. You can only use the ① and ② monster effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can banish the top 3 cards of your Deck face-down; destroy this card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Jupiter the Power Patron of Destruction" from your Extra Deck (this is treated as an Xyz Summon), then you can attach 1 card from your hand to it.
②：If this card is added to your Extra Deck face-up: You can add 1 "Power Patron" or "DoomZ" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.

name: Power Patron Shadow Spirit Junordo
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 1
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use the Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If a "Power Patron" and/or "Elvennotes" monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field while this card is in the Pendulum Zone: You can destroy this card, and if you do, draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
This card is always treated as an "Elfnote" card. You can only use the ① and ② monster effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can banish the top 3 cards of your Deck face-down; destroy this card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Junora the Power Patron of Tuning" from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Synchro Summon).
②：If this card is added to your Extra Deck face-up: You can add 1 "Power Patron" or "Elvennotes" card from your face-up Extra Deck or GY to the hand, except "Power Patron Shadow Spirit Junordo".

name: Elfnote Regina
desc:
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：(Quick Effect): You can send 1 other "Elvennotes" card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned to the center Main Monster Zone: You can Special Summon 1 "Elfnote" monster from your Deck, except "Elfnote Regina".
③：If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can add it to your hand.

name: Unleashed Power Patron Portal – Terminus
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Send 1 "Power Patron" monster from your Deck or Extra Deck to the GY, then you can add 1 DARK Fairy monster from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot declare attacks this turn, except with "Power Patron" monsters.
②：At the start of the Damage Step, if your "Power Patron" monster battles an opponent's monster: You can banish this card from your GY; banish that opponent's monster face-down.

name: Null Power Patron Realm – Videlia
desc:
You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can reveal 1 "Power Patron" monster in your Extra Deck; banish 1 card from your hand face-down, then add to your hand, or Special Summon, 1 monster from your Deck that mentions the revealed monster.
②：Monsters your opponent control lose 100 ATK for each banished card.
③：Your opponent cannot activate card effects in the GY while you control "Nerva the Power Patron of Creation", "Jupiter the Power Patron of Destruction", and "Junora the Power Patron of Tuning".

name: Artmage Impasto -Recapture-
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn. If you control an "Artmage" monster, you can activate this card the turn it was Set.
①：When your opponent activates a monster effect: Banish 1 Fusion Monster you control (until the End Phase), and if you do, negate the activation, and if you do that, destroy that card, then, if you have 3 or more different Monster Types on your field, you can return all Spells and Traps your opponent controls to the hand.

name: Subspace Battle
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：: Apply the following effect 3 times.
● Both players reveal 1 monster with non-? ATK from their Deck. Add the monster with the higher ATK to the hand of the player who revealed it, also destroy the monster with the lower ATK, and if you do, the player who revealed it takes 500 damage. If the ATK is the same, shuffle the revealed monsters into the Deck. For the rest of this turn, neither player can activate the effects of the monsters they revealed, or the effects of cards with the same name.

name: Summon Shock
desc:
①：Each time a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 1 Summon Counter on this card (max. 4)
②：If the 4th Summon Counter is placed on this card: Remove all Summon Counters from this card, and if you do, send all monsters on the field to the GY.

name: One of Two
desc:
①：Briefly reveal 1 monster and 2 Traps in your Deck, and your opponent randomly picks 1. You look at the rest and banish 1 Trap among them, then your opponent chooses 1 of these effects for you to apply.
●Reveal the picked card, and if it is a monster, either add it to your hand or Special Summon it. Otherwise, banish it. Shuffle the remaining card into the Deck.
● Reveal the card that was not picked nor banished, and if it is a monster, add it to your hand. Otherwise, banish it. Shuffle the remaining card into the Deck.

name: Hecahands Makibel
desc:
You can only use the ① and ③ effects of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can reveal this card in your hand; Fusion Summon 1 "Hecahands" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field, including this card in the hand.
②：If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle.
③：If an Illusion Fusion Monster(s) is sent to your GY while this card is in your GY: You can add this card to your hand.

name: Bayt'al-Hecahands
desc:
You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can Tribute 1 "Hecahands" monster or 1 monster owned by your opponent; take control of 1 monster your opponent controls.
②：Once per turn, during your End Phase: Send 1 card you control to the GY.

name: Hecahands Dandalos
desc:
2 "Hecahands" monsters.
You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it.
②：Your "Hecahands" Fusion Monsters and your monsters owned by your opponent can attack directly.
③：If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle.

name: Fidraulis Harmonia
desc:
You can only use the effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：When your opponent activates a monster effect on the field (Quick Effect): You can reveal this card in your hand and up to 5 Synchro Monsters in your Extra Deck; apply these effects in sequence based on the total number revealed, also you cannot activate the effects of monsters Special Summoned from the Extra Deck until the end of your next turn, except Synchro Monsters.
● 2+: Special Summon this card.
● 4+: Send 1 of the revealed Synchro Monsters to the GY.
● 6: Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

name: Convex Knight
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If a Machine monster is on the field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position, then you can make this card's Level become equal to the Level/Rank of 1 Machine monster on the field.
②：During your Main Phase: You can send 1 EARTH Machine monster from your Deck to the GY, then this card gains ATK equal to the sent monster's Level x 100 until the end of this turn.

name: Northern Cross Fire
desc:
You can only use 1 of the ① and ② effect of this card's name per turn, and only once that turn.
①：If the total Levels of the monsters you control equal 10 or higher: Add to your hand, or Special Summon, 1 Level 10 monster from your hand or Deck.
②：If the total Levels of the monsters your opponent controls equal 10 or higher: You can banish this card and 1 Level 10 monster from your GY, then target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it.

name: Diabrocken of the Ghost Light
desc:
You can only use the ①, ② and ③ effects of this card's name once per turn.
①：(Quick Effect): You can banish 1 FIRE monster from your GY or face-up field; Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; negate its effects until the end of this turn.
③：If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material: You can Set 1 Quick-Play Spell or Normal Trap that is in your GY because it was sent there this turn.

name: Lahamu the Messenger of Sacred Scripture
desc:
2 Effect Monsters
You can only use the ①, ② and ③ effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Once while this Link Summoned card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon 1 Level 5 or higher monster without Tributing.
②：During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can activate this effect; immediately after it resolves, Normal Summon 1 Level 5 or higher DARK monster.
③：During your End Phase: You can reveal any number of monsters in your hand and place them on the bottom of the Deck in any order, then draw that many cards.

name: Mimighoul Flower
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand to your opponent's field in face-down Defense Position, or, if a Set monster is on the field, you can Special Summon it to yours face-up instead.
②：FLIP: If it is the Main Phase: Apply these effects in sequence.
● Your opponent can add 1 Flip monster or "Mimighoul" card from their Deck to their hand.
● Give control of this card to your opponent.

name: Breechborrel Dragon
desc:
2 DARK Dragon monsters, including a "Rokket" monster
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Borrel" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
②：(Quick Effect): You can target 1 DARK monster you control; it gains 500 ATK, or, if it is not in the Monster Zone anymore, you can Special Summon 1 "Rokket" monster from your Deck in Defense Position instead.

name: Stealth Angecradle
desc: A mysterious entity known as "the angel that brings salvation to heretical souls". The only thing left behind after "that thing" passes through is eternal silence... Ange Passe.

name: Draselea the Blood Tree Dragon Princess
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn. You cannot Special Summon the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except Dragon and Plant monsters.
①：You can send 1 Level 4 or lower Plant monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Draselea the Blood Tree Dragon Princess"; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, its Level becomes the sent monster's.
②：You can banish this card and 1 other Plant monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 Dragon monster from your hand or GY.

name: Apex Polymerization
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn. Neither player can activate cards or effects in response to this card's activation.
①：Pay 2000 LP, then target 1 Effect Monster on the field; Special Summon 1 monster from your Extra Deck with the same Type and Attribute, but a different Level (its effects are negated), then apply 1 of these effects.
● Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using using both monsters.
● Send the Summoned monster to the GY.

name: Number 39: Utopia the Envoy of Light
desc:
2 Level 4 monsters
①：Cannot be destroyed by battle, except with a "Number" monster.
②：(Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster you control; the first time it would be destroyed by battle or card effect this turn, it is not destroyed.
③：When the second attack of this turn is declared: You can make this card gain 2500 ATK, and if you do, it gains this effect.
● When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY: You can Special Summon it to your field.

name: Odd-Eyes Pendulum Dragon of the Four
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 4
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use the Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase: You can destroy this card, and if you do, add 1 Pendulum Monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck to your hand, also, for the rest of this turn, unless you Pendulum Summon after this effect resolves, you cannot activate monster effects on the field.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
You can only use the ② monster effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：This Pendulum Summoned card gains these effects.
● Gains ATK equal to the difference between the Pendulum Scales of the 2 cards in your Pendulum Zone x 300.
● Any battle damage your opponent takes from battles involving this card is doubled.
②：If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can add it to your hand, then, if it was destroyed by your opponent, you can Special Summon it.

name: Decode Talker Integration
desc:
2+ Effect Monsters
You can only use the ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：This card in the Extra Monster Zone gains 500 ATK for every other Link Monster on the field and in the GYs, also your opponent cannot target it with card effects.
②：(Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster this card points to; send 1 Cyberse monster from your Extra Deck to the GY, also this card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase this turn.

name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon, the White Phantom
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：When this card is added from the Deck to your hand, or your monster is destroyed by battle: You can reveal this card in your hand; Special Summon it.
②：If this card is Special Summoned from the hand or Deck: You can destroy all monsters your opponent controls, also you can only attack directly with "Blue-Eyes" monsters this turn.
③：When a card or effect is activated that targets this card on the field (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card; negate that effect.

name: Cyber End Dragon the Decisive Strike Dragon
desc:
3 Machine monsters with 2100 or more ATK
Must be Fusion Summoned. You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Fusion Summoned using only LIGHT monsters: You can pay 4000 LP; add 1 "Limiter Removal" from your Deck to your hand.
②：If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.
③：This card whose current ATK is higher than its original ATK can make a second and third attack during each Battle Phase.

name: Crimson Dragon Quetzacoatl
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can only use this card name's ① and ③ effects once per turn each.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon as many Dragon Synchro Monsters from your GY as possible, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn.
②：Gains ATK equal to the total original ATK of all other Synchro Monsters you control.
③：When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can return 1 other Dragon Synchro Monster you control to the Extra Deck, and if you do, negate that activation.

name: Neo Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon – Photon Howling
desc:
3 Level 8 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Neo Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon – Photon Howling" by using 1 Rank 8 Xyz Monster you control (transfer its materials to this card).
①：If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can take 1 "Photon" monster from your Deck, and either Special Summon it in Defense Position or attach it to this card as material.
②：(Quick Effect): You can detach 3 materials from this card; Tribute 1 other Xyz Monster, and if you do, negate the effects of all other face-up cards currently on the field until the end of this turn.

name: Starving Venom Fusion Dragon of the Four Heavenly Dragons
desc:
2 DARK monsters on the field
This card is always treated as a "Predaplant" card. 
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 other face-up monster on the field; change its ATK to 0, negate its effects, also its Attribute becomes DARK.
②：When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can Fusion Summon 1 DARK Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using DARK monsters on the field, including this card.

name: Borreload Liberator Dragon
desc:
3+ Effect Monsters
You can only Special Summon "Borreload Liberator Dragon(s)" once per turn.
①：Once per turn, during the Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can place 1 monster your opponent controls in a zone this card points to and take control of it. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to this effect's activation.
②：Once per Chain, if this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster you control; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon this card.

name: Gatling Ogre
desc:
You can use the ① effect of this card's name thrice per turn.
①：You can send any number of Set cards from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY; inflict 800 damage to your opponent for each, also your opponent takes no damage from non-Fiend monsters' effects for the rest of this turn.
②：Once per turn, when this card is targeted for an attack: You can inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each of their Attack Position monsters, then end the Battle Phase.

name: Infernity Doom Slinger
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 Fiend monster from your hand.
②：If you have no cards in your hand (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; your opponent chooses 1 of these effects for you to apply.
● Reveal the top card of your Deck, and if it is a monster, your opponent takes any effect damage you would have taken this turn instead. Otherwise, you take 4000 damage.
● You take no effect damage this turn.

name: Predaplant Lilizard
desc:
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control a "Predaplant" or "Starving Venom" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck to your hand.
②：You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; its Attribute becomes DARK until the end of this turn.
③：If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can draw 1 card.

name: Predaplant Longinephila
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Predap" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Predaplant Longinephila".
②：You can banish this card from your GY, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Place 1 Predator Counter on 1 face-up monster on the field, and if it is Level 2 or higher, it becomes Level 1 as long as it has a Predator Counter.
● Set 1 "Polymerization" from your GY or banishment.

name: Familiars of the Spiritual Arts
desc:
This card is always treated as a "Familiar-Possessed" card. You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Possessed" Spell/Trap or "Grand Spiritual Art – Ichirin" from your Deck to your hand.
②：You can declare 1 Type and 1 Attribute; this card becomes the declared Type and Attribute until the end of this turn.
③：If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Spellcaster monster with 1500 DEF from your Deck or GY.

name: Starving Venom Wing Dragon
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 10
[ Pendulum Effect ]
①：Each time a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field, place 1 Predator Counter on each of them, and if you do, any of those monsters that are Level 2 or higher become Level 1 as long as they have a Predator Counter.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
1 Fusion Monster + 1 "Clear Wing" monster
①：Once per turn, if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) face-up: You can target 1 of them; until the end of this turn, this card gains ATK equal to that monster's, also negate that monster's effects.
②：Once per turn, when another card on the field activates its effect (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1 card on the field.
③：If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place it in your Pendulum Zone.

name: Red Hypernova Dragon
desc:
4 Tuners + 1+ non-Tuner Synchro Monsters
Must first be Synchro Summoned with the above material.
①：Gains 500 ATK for each Tuner in your GY.
②：Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects, also it cannot be destroyed by their card effects
③：Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can banish this card and as many cards your opponent controls as possible and in their GY, then you can Special Summon 1 "Red Nova Dragon" from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Synchro Summon).

name: Predaplant Baalthea
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Predaplant" or "Starving Venom" monster from your face-up Extra Deck or GY.
②：If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field: You can banish this card and 1 "Polymerization" from your GY; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field.

name: Four Charmers in Profusion
desc:
2+ monsters
You can only use the ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：Gains 300 ATK for each Attribute among monsters on the field.
②：Once while face-up on the field, during the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 2 monsters in your GY with the same Type OR Attribute; Special Summon both, but they and this card cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon until the end of the next turn.

name: Predaprimitive
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：Send 1 "Predap" card from your Deck to the GY, except "Predaprimitive"; add 1 "Polymerization" Spell or "Fusion" Spell from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, except Plant and Dragon monsters.
②：If a monster(s) is Special Summon to your opponent's field: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Fusion Monster you control; destroy it.

name: Possessed Resonance
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Target 1 face-up monster on the field; Special Summon 1 "Charmer" or "Familiar-Possessed" monster with the same Attribute from your hand, Deck, or GY in Attack Position or face-down Defense Position, then you can change the targeted monster to face-down Defense Position.
②：You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 monster you control; change its battle position.

name: Stardust Dragon – Victim Sanctuary
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn, also you cannot activate them in the same Chain.
①：When your opponent activates a card or effect in response to the activation of your card or effect (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; negate that opponent's effect, and if you do, destroy that card.
②：If your monster(s) was Tributed this turn (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Stardust" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck.

name: Assault Sonic Warrior
desc:
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control "Junk Warrior", "Assault Mode Activate", or a card that mentions either of them: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Synchron" monster or "Assault Mode Activate" from your Deck to your hand.
③：If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can activate this effect; this turn, monsters you control will gain 500 ATK.

name: Junk Signal
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：Activate 1 of these effects; you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Synchro Monsters.
● Tribute 1 monster; Special Summon 1 "Junk Warrior", 1 "Stardust Dragon", or 1 monster that mentions either of them from your hand, Deck, or GY, except the Tributed monster.
● When your opponent activates a card or effect in response to the activation of your Synchro Monster's effect: Negate that opponent's effect.

name: Master Spirit Tech Force – Pendulum Ruler
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 1
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use the Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase: You can return this card to the Extra Deck, then you can add 1 Level 7 Pendulum Monster from your Deck or face-up Extra Deck to your hand.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
1 Level 7 or higher Pendulum Monster + 1 Pendulum Monster
You can only use the ③ monster effect of this card's name up to twice per turn.
①：Cannot be destroyed by card effects.
②：Your opponent's monsters cannot attack, except Pendulum Monsters without a Level.
③：You can Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, inflict 1600 damage to them.
④：Once per turn: You can place place this card in your Pendulum Zone.

name: Favorite HERO Shining Flare Wingman
desc:
1 Fusion Monster + 1 face-up monster on the field
This card is always treated as an "Elemental HERO" card. You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can shuffle 5 monsters from your GY into the Deck, then draw 2 cards, and if you do, this card gains 1000 ATK.
②：If this card destroys a monster by battle: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's original ATK.

name: Underworld Circle
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per Duel.
①：Activate this card if there are 5 or more monsters in each GY; destroy as many monsters on the field as possible, then each player banishes all monsters from their Deck, face-down, then you can Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your GY.
②：Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: Each player can Special Summon 1 monster from their GY, ignoring its Summoning conditions, but banish it when it leaves the field.

name: Cherubidamn Irisfiel
desc:
2 Level 8 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Cherubidamn Irisfiel" by using 1 Xyz Monster you control that has not activated its effect in the Monster Zone this turn (transfer its materials to this card).
①：If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can activate this effect; this turn, Xyz Monsters you control will gain ATK equal to their own Rank x 100 during the Battle Phase only.
②：If this card would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can detach 1 material from your monsters instead.

name: Transient Masquerader of Illusion
desc:
You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn. 
You can only use the ③ effect of this card's name once per Duel.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 Fiend, Illusion, or Spellcaster monster from your Deck to the GY, then you can make this card's Type become the sent monster's original Type.
②：If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle.
③：If this card is in your GY: You can banish 1 Spell from your GY; Special Summon this card.

name: Doom Regina Archfiend
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 9
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use the Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can target 1 "Archfiend" Spell/Trap in your GY or banishment; destroy this card, and if you do, add that card to your hand.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Throne of Archfiends". 
Must be Ritual Summoned. 
You can only use the ① Monster Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can destroy all Spells and Traps your opponent controls, then, if this card is in the Extra Monster Zone, you can banish all Spells and Traps in your opponent's GY.
②：Unaffected by other monsters' effects while in the Extra Monster Zone.

name: Archfiend Usurpation
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：Activate 1 of these effects;
● Set 1 "Archfiend" Trap from your Deck or GY. It can be activated this turn.
● Ritual Summon 1 "Archfiend" Ritual Monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck, by Tributing monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal or exceed its Level.

name: Fairy Tail – Matchlille
desc:
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If a Spellcaster monster with 1850 original ATK is on the field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Spellcaster monsters.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Fairy Tail" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
③：You can pay 500 LP; the name of 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls becomes "Fairy Prince".

name: Weaver of Fairy Tail Tales
desc:
1 "Fairy Tail" monster + 1 Spellcaster monster
You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Fairy Tail" monster from your Deck or banishment.
②：If you Normal or Special Summon a non-EARTH "Fairy Tail" monster(s) while this monster is on the field: You can target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects, also its name becomes "Fairy Prince".
③：Any "Fairy Prince" on the field becomes a Spellcaster monster.

name: Chronicler of Fairy Tail Tales
desc:
1 LIGHT "Fairy Tail" monster + 1 Spellcaster monster
You can only use the ① and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Fusion Summoned using "Fairy Prince" as material: You can destroy as many cards your opponent controls as possible, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to them for each.
②：Your "Fairy Tail" monsters cannot be destroyed by battle.
③：When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Fairy Tail" card from your hand or GY, except "Fairy Tail Tales"; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

name: Fairy Tail – Wickat
desc:
2 Level 4 Spellcaster monsters
You can only use the ② and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①："Fairy Tail" monsters you control whose original Attribute is LIGHT are unaffected by your opponent's activated effects.
②：You can detach up to 2 materials from this card; send that many "Fairy Tail" cards from your Deck to the GY, except "Fairy Tail Tales".
③：If this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Fairy Tail" monster you control whose original Attribute is LIGHT; Special Summon this card, and if you do, send that monster to the GY.

name: Fairy Tail Long Long Ago
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Special Summon up to 1 LIGHT "Fairy Tail" monster with different names each from your hand, GY, and/or banishment, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Spellcaster monsters.
②：If this card is sent to the GY, except from the field, or becomes banished: You can Set it, but it cannot be activated unless you control a "Fairy Tail" monster.

name: Fairy Tail Ball
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：When this card resolves, you can add 1 "Fairy Tail" monster or "Fairy Tail Tales" from your Deck or banishment to your hand.
②：Your "Fairy Tail" monsters can attack directly.
③：Once per turn, if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) and you control a "Fairy Tail" monster: You can target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects, also its name becomes "Fairy Prince".

name: Tales of Fairy Tail
desc:
You can only use the ③ effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：The equipped monster gains 1000 ATK.
②：Once per turn: You can Fusion Summon 1 Spellcaster Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field. You can also use any "Fairy Prince" your opponent controls.
③：If this card is in the GY: You can equip it to a "Fairy Tail" monster on the field, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 Spellcaster monster with 1850 ATK.

name: Heavy Knight Babel Decker
desc:
You can only use the ② and ③ effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can Normal Summon this card without Tributing.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 EARTH Machine monster from your hand.
③：If your opponent activated a card or effect this turn: You can Special Summon 1 Rank 10 EARTH Machine monster from your Extra Deck using this card you control as material (this is treated as an Xyz Summon).

name: Noctilucent Train Bleu Traveler
desc:
You can use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn. You can use the ② effect of this card's name once per Duel.
①：You can discard this card; add 1 "Train Connection" or "Revolving Switchyard" from your Deck or GY to your hand.
②：If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 other EARTH Machine monster in your GY; Special Summon it and this card, also your cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Machine monsters.

name: Superdreadnought Rail Cannon Gustav Rocket
desc:
3 Level 10 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Superdreadnought Rail Cannon Gustav Rocket" by discarding 1 card and using "Superdreadnought Rail Cannon Gustav Max" you control (transfer its materials to this card). You can use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：When your opponent activates a monster effect and this card has material (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that monster, then inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.
②：Once per turn, during your End Phase: Detach 1 material from this card or destroy it.

name: Superdreadnought Rail Cannon Flying Launcher
desc:
2 Level 10 monsters
You can use the ① and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can add 1 EARTH Machine monster or "Barrage Blast" from your Deck to your hand.
②：During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 Machine monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set (you can only gain this effect once per turn).
③：You can detach any number of materials from this card, then target that many Spells/Traps on the field; destroy them.

name: Exceptional Schedule
desc:
You can use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Add 1 "Special Schedule" or "Urgent Schedule" from your Deck to your hand, then you can Special Summon 1 "Schedule Token" (Machine/EARTH/Level 10/ATK 3000/DEF 3000) to your opponent's field.
②：You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Level 10 Machine monster in your GY or banishment; send 1 card you control to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon that monster.

name: Verre, the Maid of Endymion
desc:
This card is always treated as a "Witchcrafter" card. You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase, if a Spell Card or effect was activated this turn: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Witchcrafter" Spell/Trap or "Magical Dimension" from your Deck to your hand.
③：Gains 2300 ATK while you have "Regulus, the Prince of Endymion" in your field or GY.

name: Dark Magician, the Pharaoh's Servant
desc:
You can only use 1 of the ② and ③ effect of this card's name per turn, and only once that turn.
①：This card's name becomes "Dark Magician" while on the field or in the GY.
②：You can reveal 1 Spell in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap that mentions "Dark Magician" from your Deck.
③：(Quick Effect): You can discard 1 Spell; destroy all Spells and Traps your opponent controls.

name: Darkness Resonator
desc:
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can reveal 1 "Red Dragon Archfiend" in your Extra Deck; Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Synchro Monsters.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: You can activate this effect; during your Main Phase this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "Resonator" in addition to your Normal Summon/Set (you can only gain this effect once per turn).
③：You can target any number of Tuners you control; their Levels become 1.

name: Power Vice Dragon
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are DARK Synchro Monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Resonator" monster from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except DARK Synchro Monsters.
③：A "Red Dragon Archfiend" Summoned using this card as Synchro Material cannot be destroyed by battle.

name: Fiend Piece Golem
desc:
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control a Fiend Tuner: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: You can decrease its Level by up to 2.
③：If this card is sent to the GY as material for the Synchro Summon of "Red Dragon Archfiend" or a monster that mentions it: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Fiend monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position.

name: Red Nova Dragon/Assault Mode
desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Assault Mode Activate".
①：When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can banish this card until the End Phase; banish cards your opponent controls up to the number of Tuners in your GY.
②：When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can banish this card until the End Phase; negate the attack, then end the Battle Phase.
③：If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Red Nova Dragon" from your GY.

name: The Crimson King
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner DARK monsters
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 card that mentions "Red Dragon Archfiend" from your Deck to your hand.
②：When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 "Red Dragon Archfiend" from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Synchro Summon), and if you do, its current ATK becomes doubled, also it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

name: Crimson Blade Dragon
desc:
1 "Resonator" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
This card is always treated as "Crimson Blader". You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add to your hand, or Special Summon (but its effects are negated), 1 Level 8 or higher monster from your Deck or GY that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set.
②：At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles a Level 5 or higher monster: You can destroy that monster.

name: Crimson Call
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：Add 1 Level 4 or lower Fiend monster from your GY to your hand, or, if you control "Red Dragon Archfiend" or a Synchro Monster that mentions it, you can add the monster from your Deck instead.
②：If your "/Assault Mode" monster or "Red Dragon Archfiend" attacks, at the end of the Damage Step: You can banish this card from your GY; that monster can make a second attack in a row.

name: The Ruler's Rumbling
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card name's per turn. Neither player can activate cards or effects in response to this card's activation if your opponent Special Summoned 10 or more monsters this turn.
①：Apply these effects, in sequence, based on the number of monsters your opponent Special Summoned this turn.
● 1+: Special Summon 1 DARK Synchro Monster from your GY or banishment.
● 3+: "Red Dragon Archfiend" in your Monster Zone is unaffected by your opponent's activated effects until the end of your next turn.
● 5+: Change all monsters your opponent currently controls to face-down Defense Position.

name: Charmers of the Grand Circle
desc:
2+ "Charmer" and/or "Familiar-Possessed" monsters
You can only use the effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can choose among these effects a number of times up to the number of original Attributes among its material (max. 4) and apply them in sequence (you can choose the same effect multiple times)
● This card gains 800 ATK.
● Add 1 "Possessed" Spell/Trap from the Deck to the hand.
● Return 1 card on the field to the hand
● Special Summon 1 Spellcaster monster from the GY.

name: Spellbook of the Grand Circle
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effects of this card's name once per turn each.
①：Add 4 "Charmer" monsters with different Attributes from your Deck, GY and/or banishment to your hand, then return 2 cards from your hand to your Deck.
②：You can banish this card from your GY; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster using "Charmer" and/or "Familiar-Possessed" monsters from your hand or field. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects when that monster is Fusion Summoned.
